title: Inflation held firm in December, testing Fed amid DOJ probe into Powell
full_text: Inflation held firm in December, testing Fed amid DOJ probe into Powell. Inflation held steady in December, continuing to prove stubborn just days after reports of a Department of Justice probe into Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell..
